title: Vine stalker (monster)
data:
{{version028}}
''This page is about the vine stalker [[monster]]. For the player race, see [[Vine Stalker]].''
{{monster info|vine stalker}}

==Useful Info==
'''Vine stalkers''' are hybrid plant creatures.

==Tips & Tricks==
Like most monsters based off of player [[species]], vine stalkers do not spawn naturally. If you see one, it's probably a shapeshifter. They may also spawn in decorative arrival or [[Pandemonium]] vaults.

Be aware that vine stalkers regenerate more quickly than normal and have an [[antimagic]] bite, though neither are likely to matter much to characters that encounter one.

==History==
Monstrous vine stalkers were added in [[0.14]] along with the player race.
